section_title: 24a00  General provisions of FLSA Sec 13(b)(1) and IB 782.
text:
(a)   FLSA Sec 13(b)(1) provides that FLSA Sec
7 shall not apply to any employee for whom the Department of Transportation’s
Federal Highway Administration (DOT/FHWA) has power to establish qualifications
and maximum hours of service pursuant to the provisions of Sec 204 of the Motor
Carrier Act of 1935. (b)   IB 782, together with the instructions
contained in this chapter, form the official WH position with respect to the
application of Sec 13(b)(l).
